com.qtplaf.library.util

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils
      • com.qtplaf.library.util.StringUtils

  • public class StringUtils
extends org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils
    String utilities extended from Apache Commons Lang.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • toUnescaped

        public static java.lang.String toUnescaped(java.lang.String msg,
                                           java.lang.String charsetName)
                                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method unescapes a message. It is useful to decode the request arguments in a HTTP Query String or a HTTP form URL encoded request.
        Parameters:
        msg - The String to be unescaped.
        charsetName - The charset to be used.
        Returns:
        the unescaped String
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If the char set does not exist.

                                           java.lang.String charsetName)
                                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException

        Parameters:

        charsetName - The charset to be used.
        Returns:
        the unescaped String

      • toEscaped

        public static java.lang.String toEscaped(java.lang.String msg,
                                         java.lang.String charsetName)
                                  throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method escapes a message. It is useful to encode the request arguments in a HTTP GET request method.
        Parameters:
        msg - The String to be escaped.
        charsetName - The charset to be used.
        Returns:
        the escaped String
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - In msg.getBytes(charsetName)
